param.label: PBS queue
param.help: Queue to submit the interactive job. Must select one! Use [qstat -f -Q] to list all queues on the system

param.name: pbs_scheduler_directives

param.help: e.g. -l mem=1000;-l nodes=1:ppn=4 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the PBS keyword.
